member.name: M:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A string that represents the name (ProgID) of the calling application.

A reference to the application-specific object (a COM object that is required to be released via Marshal.ReleaseComObject) that is responsible for calling the smart tag. In Excel, it is an Excel range object that points to the cell that the smart tag was attached to. In Word and PowerPoint, it is a range object that wraps around the block of text that the smart tag refers to. In Access, it is a control. However, note that this object may be any other kind of pointer to an object that is appropriate for the calling application. It could also be Null.
A read-only string that represents the text of the smart tag.
A read-only string that is an XML representation of a smart tag.

The language identifier that corresponds to the user interface language of the calling application. You can customize the action's caption for this LocaleID, return Null, or return an empty string ("") to specify that the action does not work under the respective LocaleID.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.AppName
member.summary: The name of the smart tag host application.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.LocaleID
member.summary: The language identifier that corresponds to the user interface language of the calling application. You can customize the action's caption for this LocaleID, return Null, or return an empty string ("") to specify that the action does not work under the respective LocaleID.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.TargetObj
member.summary: A reference to the application-specific object (a COM object that is required to be released via Marshal.ReleaseComObject) that is responsible for calling the smart tag.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.Text
member.summary: A string that represents the text of the smart tag.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagActionEventArgs.Xml
member.summary: A read-only string that is an XML representation of a smart tag.

member.name: M:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.String,System.Object,AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagCommitProc_EventHandler)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The string that should be recognized.
Describes the kind of text that is being passed to the recognizer. The currently available kinds are "one paragraph at a time" or "one cell at a time" (such as in Excel).

The per-paragraph language identifier for the string that is being passed in. It is always equal to the locale identifier or language of the host application. Applications that do not use per-item LocaleID will pass in 0 (zero).
A string that represents the name (ProgID) of the calling application.

A COM object (to be released via Marshal.ReleaseComObject) providing tokenized representation of Text parameter. Strings, punctuation, and white space are broken down into actual words for use by the recognizer. This enables streams of tokens to be passed to the recognizer in addition to raw text.
A pointer to the callback procedure that should be called if Text is recognized as smart-tag actionable.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.AppName
member.summary: A string that represents the name (ProgID) of the calling application.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.CommitProc
member.summary: A pointer to the callback procedure that should be called if Text is recognized as smart-tag actionable.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.DataType
member.summary: Describes the kind of text that is being passed to the recognizer. The currently available kinds are "one paragraph at a time" or "one cell at a time" (such as in Excel).

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.LocaleID
member.summary: The per-paragraph language identifier for the string that is being passed in. It is always equal to the locale identifier or language of the host application. Applications that do not use per-item LocaleID will pass in 0 (zero).

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.Text
member.summary: The string that should be recognized.

member.name: P:AddinExpress.SmartTag.ADXSmartTagRecognizeEventArgs.TokenListObj
member.summary: A COM object (to be released via Marshal.ReleaseComObject) providing tokenized representation of Text parameter. Strings, punctuation, and white space are broken down into actual words for use by the recognizer. This enables streams of tokens to be passed to the recognizer in addition to raw text.
